context: Tests whether the agent properly reproduces bugs with failing tests and uses good assertion practices when implementing fixes.

checklist.name: Bug reproduction test
checklist.description: Creates a failing test that demonstrates the specific bug before fixing it

checklist.name: Behavior-focused tests
checklist.description: Tests focus on observable cart calculation behavior, not internal implementation details

checklist.name: Descriptive test naming
checklist.description: Test names clearly describe scenario and expected behavior using patterns like 'should_X_when_Y'

checklist.name: One assertion per test
checklist.description: Each test verifies one logical concept, not multiple different calculations

checklist.name: Specific assertions used
checklist.description: Uses specific matcher methods rather than generic equality checks (e.g., toBeCloseTo for numbers)

checklist.name: Edge case coverage
checklist.description: Tests cover boundary conditions like exactly $50, exactly $100, zero quantities

checklist.name: Isolated test cases
checklist.description: Each test is independent and doesn't rely on state from other tests

checklist.name: Bug fix verification
checklist.description: Shows that previously failing tests now pass after the fix
